Class Size: 320 students
AP Courses: AP Computer Science A, AP Calculus AB, AP Chemistry, AP English Language, AP Physics 1
Honors Courses: Honors Biology, Honors Algebra II, Honors US History, Honors English 10

Testing

ACT Composite: 34 (English 35, Math 33, Reading 34, Science 33)
PSAT: 1500; AP Exams: 5s in CSA, Lang; 4s in Calc AB, Chemistry

Coursework
International Baccalaureate HL Math, Dual Enrollment Calculus II at local college, Cambridge A Level Physics

Activities
1. President, Robotics Club – led 30 students; 250+ volunteer hours mentoring younger teams.

3. Internship at AI startup (summer 2024) working on computer vision research project.
4. Research assistant at university lab; published regional science fair finalist.
5. Summer Program: MIT LaunchX entrepreneurship fellowship.
6. Founded nonprofit tutoring; weekly community service and outreach.
7. Continuing to mentor younger stu
